casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Thedford Roy RORIE, Jr. No. 311P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Andrew DeSimone, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Rorie, Jr., Thedford Roy. John F. Oates, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of September 2015 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
